channel.title: 525 server with Fathien blade v2 client - how to change the ip?
channel.description:
Ok im using a 525 server with Fathien blade v2 client. I have found my client.java file but have no idea which string of code to change! There is nothing in the file i can find that would indicate which string to change so if anyone could help... :confused: Thanks in advance. Oh the server and client can both be found here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,464771.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,464771.0.html[/url]
Edit: Also I can't find a string called server.... One of the other posts said search for server and change the ip, but i cant find anything that says server in my client.java file...

item.title: 525 server with Fathien blade v2 client - how to change the ip?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Not used a 525 client before, but look for the following files.

GUI.java
client.java
client2.java
loader.java

try looking in those.

Read full topic
item.source: 525 server with Fathien blade v2 client - how to change the ip?
